short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wazzup extension for HubSpot crm. Extends HubSpot crm UI with Wazzup chats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wazzup connects WhatsApp and Instagram to Hubspot CRM. You can chat with clients directly from the deal card or through a convenient chat window, which displays all available dialogs. In addition, you can automatically distribute new requests between employees and write to clients first in Whatsapp or Instagram.
